name: Jade (troyprag816@gmail.com)
description: First Ludum Dare and riding solo here. What a hectic three-day event has it been. Still trying to press cmd+s every 5 seconds. Only the html save page reminds me it is over. A programmer trying to build game without art truly sucks. Better find some teammates next time. I don’t how I come up with the Jade theme, maybe it is the desire inside of me wanting to play some hearthstone lol.
